meanings.definition: To blend or grind food into a smooth, creamy consistency.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys pureeing fruits to make delicious smoothies.
meanings.sent2: The chef is pureeing the vegetables to make a creamy soup.
meanings.sent3: Pureeing the ingredients together turned out to be a messy but fun task.
meanings.sent4: Her blender was like a magician, pureeing the ingredients into a silky potion.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the blender pureeing the ingredients filled the kitchen with a comforting hum.

meanings.definition: The act of pureeing food to create a smooth texture.
meanings.sent1: The pureeing of the soup resulted in a velvety consistency.
meanings.sent2: I use a food processor for the pureeing of fruits for my baby.
meanings.sent3: The pureeing of the vegetables was the highlight of the cooking demonstration.
meanings.sent4: The pureeing of the ingredients was like a gentle dance of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The pureeing of the sauce made it look like a work of art on the plate.
